welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hatch End, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore the city's unique charm.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Heathrow's oldest terminal, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Heathrow's newest terminal, opened in 2014 and serving mainly European and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Heathrow's second oldest terminal, serving mainly long-haul and some European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Heathrow's third oldest terminal, serving mainly long-haul and some European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Heathrow's largest terminal, serving mainly British Airways and some other airlines' flights.

wifi.note: Free for the first 45 minutes, then a fee applies.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Luton Airport serves low-cost carriers and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Terminal 3 at Luton Airport serves private and business aviation.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to the needs of private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Benson Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
